name: Laravel
description: The most popular PHP framework. Super pleasant to work with, extremely active ecosystem.

name: Tailwind CSS
description: A low-level, utility-first CSS framework. One of the best tools available in the modern web. It made me appreciate front-end.

name: Vue
description: My go-to UI framework. Versatile, performant, very active ecosystem and incredible developer experience.

name: Hybridly
description: A library for making server-driven single-page applications, architectured as monoliths.
